roleset.name: make local, assigning to a specific place
roleset.note: LOCALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'localize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from localize.01-v predicate notes)
LOCALIZATION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, localize-v.01. No VNcls. (from localization.01-n)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Advertising rates for the Eastern, Midwest, Western and Southwest editions will increase an average 5.5%, and rates for localized advertising editions will increase 7.5%.

example.name: Both args
example.text: These authors point out that neuro-ophthalmology textbooks are inconsistent in their localization of Claude's syndrome.

example.name: EXT
example.text: All of the SNP 's gripes can be solved by greater localisation - not by a pointless break up .

roleset.name: belonging to a particular area
roleset.note: LOCAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from local.01-j)

role.descr: entity belonging to a particular area

example.name: both args
example.text: The printer becomes a network printer but it is local to the computer to which it is directly connected.
example.arg: to the computer to which it is directly connected
